framework
Interface ValueChoiceFunction

public interface ValueChoiceFunction

Basic abstract class for defining ValueChoiceFunctions of Variable Domains.

Author:
Federico Pecora

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object getValue(Domain dom)
          Method to be implemented by the Domain developer to choose a value.
 

Method Detail

getValue

java.lang.Object getValue(Domain dom)
Method to be implemented by the Domain developer to choose a value.

Parameters:
dom - The domain from which to choose a value.
Returns:
A value chosen from the given Domain according to this ValueChoiceFunction.
